attributes.action: Stop British Energy going into foreign ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Energy is one of the biggest electricity suppliers in the country. Few UK energy companies can afford to buy it due to them being stopped from expanding into countries such as France, Germany, Spain etc. Why should these foregn countries be allowed to buy a strategic asset of ours when this is not allowed in their countries? They have already bought the majority of our electricity industry for which we are now paying the price.
The EU only plays fair when it suits certain major countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
